snippet: The ruling on Monday by Judge Dale Cohen of Broward County mirrors decisions made last month by judges in Monroe and Miami-Dade Counties.
abstract: Judge Dale Cohen of Broward Country overturns Florida's ban on same-sex marriage, mirroring decisions made in July by judges in Monroe and Miami-Dade Counties, but stays his decision pending an appeal.
lead_paragraph: The ruling on Monday by Judge Dale Cohen of Broward County mirrors decisions made last month by judges in Monroe and Miami-Dade Counties.

headline.main: Florida: Gay Marriage Ban Overturned in 3rd County
headline.print_headline: Florida: Gay Marriage Ban Overturned in 3rd County

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
